nodes.text: R2-C4, or "Seefor", was a yellow R2-series astromech droid produced by Industrial Automaton that served the Royal Naboo Security Forces.[source?]
Queen Amidala's royal starship held a complement of droids, one of which was R2-C4.
During the Battle of Naboo, this droid was present in the Theed Hangar with a member of Bravo Flight, Lt. Gavyn Sykes (Bravo 6) prior to the space battle.
